322
May 13th 4
Maj
W H. Sidell U. S A
Asst Pro M. Genl
Louisville Ky.
Major.

I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 11th inst. I have given recruiting authority to various persons and instructions to report success from time to time. The draft has doubtless retarded our success to some extent in this enterprise. His Excellency has determined to draft the militia of the state to supply these 10,000 men, and Inspector Genl Lindsey is preparing to carry the draft out at an early date. You will be duly notified from time to time of the action taken, and success attending our efforts.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
